title: can anyone name this font? Futura Bold Condensed i think, but the S, M and C is way off. anyone?
content:
anyone have any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201102640/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_96.png) | 353.7 KB |
author: billwatterson

comments.content: i have people telling me its Futura Bold Condensed, but the M, C and the S dont match, and i have people telling me its a mess load of fonts into one, but thats rediculous

[Avant Garde Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201102640/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/itc-avant-garde-gothic/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D41%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DEXTRA%2520FINE%2520GRIND%2520AUTOMATIQUE%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D35) (scroll to the bottom of the page to see the condensed style).
